com.foreach.across.modules.spring.security.acl.services

Class DefaultAclPermissionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.security.acls.domain.DefaultPermissionFactory
      • com.foreach.across.modules.spring.security.acl.services.DefaultAclPermissionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AclPermissionFactory, org.springframework.security.acls.domain.PermissionFactory

    public class DefaultAclPermissionFactory
extends org.springframework.security.acls.domain.DefaultPermissionFactory
implements AclPermissionFactory
    Default implementation of AclPermissionFactory.

    NOTE: In this implementation permission names are always case insensitive and stored as lowercase.

    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

      • getNameForPermission

        public String getNameForPermission(org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission permission)
        Description copied from interface: AclPermissionFactory
        Retrieve the registered name for a permission. Will throw an IllegalArgumentException if the permission is not registered.

        This method cannot be used for CumulativePermission instances unless they are also registered.

        Specified by:
        getNameForPermission in interface AclPermissionFactory
        Parameters:
        permission - to get the name for
        Returns:
        registered name
